parameters.name: DatasetMaxBindCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of bindings per dataset. The range is 1~10, with a default value of 10.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxEntityCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of metadata entities in each dataset. The default value is 10000000000.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxFileCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of files in each dataset. The range is 1~100000000, with a default value of 100000000.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxRelationCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of metadata relationships in each dataset. The default value is 100000000000.

parameters.name: DatasetMaxTotalFileSize
parameters.description: The maximum total size of files in each dataset. Once the limit is exceeded, no more indexes can be added. The default value is 90000000000000000, in bytes.

parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description:
The name of the dataset, which must be unique under the same Project. Naming rules are as follows:
- Length should be 1~128 characters.
- Can only contain English letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and underscores (_).
- Must start with an English letter or underscore (_).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Description of the dataset. The length should be 1~256 English or Chinese characters, with a default value of empty.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. For more information on how to obtain it, see [Create Project](~~478153~~).

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: Workflow template ID. For more information, see [Workflow Templates and Operators](~~466304~~). The default value is empty.
